llm_command:
kubectl
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: recommendationservice-deny-payment
  namespace: recommendationservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: recommendationservice
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  egress:
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: paymentservice
    ports:
    - port: 50051
      protocol: TCP
EOF
